settings.title: Shipping & Delivery
settings.content: All North American orders are typically delivered within 3-5 business days. International is 6-10 business days.

settings.title: Composition & Care
settings.content:
Composition
98% Cotton
2% Polyester

Care Instructions
Wash with like colours in cold water and hang to dry. We also recommend dry cleaning to ensure the best results.

settings.offer_1_content: If you spend over $400 USD (before tax), you'll receive a free hat with your order. Simply choose any hat, and its cost will be automatically discounted to 100% in your shopping cart.

settings.question: How long does shipping take?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.question: Can I Return My Order?
settings.answer:
You can return your order within 14 days. Register the item(s) you wish to return using our online portal.

Go to https://bydavidkollar.com/pages/returns to start your return. Once the process is complete, you will be emailed a return label. We will happily exchange your item or issue you a refund for all or part of your order.

They must arrive back to us no later than 28 days from the delivery date.

settings.question: Can I Get Free Shipping?
settings.answer: Currently we are providing free shipping to US & Canadian customers.

settings.question: Can I Buy Now and Pay Later?
settings.answer: Yes, we have partnered with Afterpay which will allow you to split up payments upon checkout.

settings.question: Do I Have to Pay Import Duty?
settings.answer:
Canadian orders are sent with the duty paid. So, there are no extra charges.

USA : Orders under $800USD will not be charged duties usually.

When importing items to outside of the Canada, this will normally trigger a customs inspection. We always provide the correct paperwork with your order.

Customs may or may not charge an import duty. This is outside of our control.

We cannot be held responsible for how long it takes your order to pass through customs.

Please note that you will always be responsible for paying any import charges.
